aboutText:
This is a collection of stories and experiences from my life and career, both on and off the screen.

The blog takes a comic approach to entering tech "later" in life, with a satirical take on my technical knowledge and enlightenment.

Here you can filter through and comment on posts, and last but not least play around with the neat little color-mode toggler beside the logo. Can you spot a sci-fi movie reference? ðŸ›¸
